ca.corefacility.gview.data.readers

Class GViewFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.data.readers.GViewFileReader

  • public class GViewFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory to create GViewFileReaders from the passed input file. Handles file format/file reading.
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public static GViewFileData read(java.io.File file,
                 FileFormatReader reader)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 GViewDataParseException
        Reads in the passed GView file using the format defined by the particular FileFormatReader.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to read in.
        reader - The particular reader to use defining how to interpret the file.
        Returns:
        A GViewFileData object with the extracted information from the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there was an error when reading the file.
        GViewDataParseException - If a parsing error occured when reading the file.

      • read

        public static GViewFileData read(java.lang.String filename,
                 FileFormatReader reader)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 GViewDataParseException
        Reads in the passed GView file using the format defined by the particular FileFormatReader.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file to read in.
        reader - The particular reader to use defining how to interpret the file.
        Returns:
        A GViewFileData object with the extracted information from the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there was an error when reading the file.
        GViewDataParseException - If a parsing error occured when reading the file.

      • read

        public static GViewFileData read(java.lang.String fileLocation)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 GViewDataParseException
        Reads in the passed GView file and returns the extracted data.
        Parameters:
        fileLocation - The name and location of the file to read in (can be a URI, or a raw path).
        Returns:
        A GViewFileData object with the extracted information from the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there was an error when reading the file.
        GViewDataParseException - If a parsing error occurred when reading the file.

      • read

        public static GViewFileData read(java.io.Reader reader,
                 FileFormatReader formatReader)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 GViewDataParseException
        Reads in GView data from the passed reader.
        Parameters:
        reader - The reader to read from.
        formatReader - A formatReader to use for the particular type of data (Genbank, CGView, etc).
        Returns:
        A GViewFileData object containing the GenomeData and possibly the style.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        GViewDataParseException - If a parsing error occurred when reading the data.

      • read

        public static GViewFileData read(java.net.URL url)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 GViewDataParseException
        Reads in the passed GView file from a URL and returns the extracted data.
        Parameters:
        url - The file to read in.
        Returns:
        A GViewFileData object with the extracted information from the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there was an error when reading the data.
        GViewDataParseException - If a parsing error occurred when reading the file.

      • canRead

        public static boolean canRead(java.net.URL fileLocation)
        Determines if GView can read the passed file.
        Parameters:
        fileLocation - The file to test.
        Returns:
        True if this file can be read, false otherwise.
